title: Child's Dress, 1860–70
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell
description: Very full skirt falling from shoulder yoke, round neck with Peter Pan collar, long sleeves, buttons down back. Entire dress made from a double thickness of fabric, which is strie brown and white with tiny bud repeat in red, green, brown and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Child's Dress, 1860–70.
1860–70. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Mary M. Kenway from the estate of Sarah B. Russell. 1956-181-23.
